answers.answer: She's already 6.5 pounds and full term.
Just wait it out. 6.5 is a pretty small widdle baby :) still has room to grow yet!

I'm 38+3 and I just switched to a midwife, their going off the records from my old Dr who was just going off the period too! I had an appointment today and when using the measuring tape, I measure 42 weeks!! But no dilation. So who knows

question: My original date was june 3rd. I was neasuring big so they sent me to a specialist for an ultrasound(previous dr only went by my guess of when my period was. i have a toddler already period dates don't natter anynore lol. they never measured baby) the specialist moved it up to this friday!!! My normal doc goes by that date now but the other dr in her office doesn't and tells me my baby is big. idk what to do. they will induce me thanks to gestational diabetes but now they are saying they can't because I'm due the 3rd. any advice on what to do????
title: dr cant decide on a due date and wont induce! help!
